generated.css: @import url(https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Open+Sans:400,700,600,300,800);@import url(https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Exo:100);@import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css?family=Quicksand");*{font-family:sans-serif;box-sizing:border-box}.grid-area{margin-top:30px}.grid-area table{max-width:700px;margin:auto;user-select:none}.grid-area table td{width:20px;height:20px}.grid-area table td.selected{color:rgba(231,75,8,.959)}h1{text-align:center;font-family:Arial,sans-serif;font-size:36px;font-weight:700;color:#333;text-shadow:2px 2px 2px #ccc;letter-spacing:1px;line-height:1.5;margin-top:10px}@-webkit-keyframes bg-scrolling-reverse{to{background-position:50px 50px}}@-moz-keyframes bg-scrolling-reverse{to{background-position:50px 50px}}@-o-keyframes bg-scrolling-reverse{to{background-position:50px 50px}}@keyframes bg-scrolling-reverse{to{background-position:50px 50px}}@-webkit-keyframes bg-scrolling{0%{background-position:50px 50px}}@-moz-keyframes bg-scrolling{0%{background-position:50px 50px}}@-o-keyframes bg-scrolling{0%{background-position:50px 50px}}@keyframes bg-scrolling{0%{background-position:50px 50px}}body{margin-top:1rem;min-height:100vh;display:flex;flex-direction:column;color:#999;font:400 16px/1.5 exo,ubuntu,segoe ui,helvetica,arial,sans-serif;text-align:center;background:url("data:image/png;base64,") repeat 0 0;-webkit-animation:bg-scrolling-reverse .92s infinite;-moz-animation:bg-scrolling-reverse .92s infinite;-o-animation:bg-scrolling-reverse .92s infinite;animation:bg-scrolling-reverse .92s infinite;-webkit-animation-timing-function:linear;-moz-animation-timing-function:linear;-o-animation-timing-function:linear;animation-timing-function:linear}body:before{content:"Word Search Game";font-size:5rem;font-weight:700;font-style:normal}.seven h1{text-align:center;font-size:30px;font-weight:300;color:#999;letter-spacing:1px;text-transform:uppercase;display:grid;grid-template-columns:1fr max-content 1fr;grid-template-rows:27px 0;grid-gap:20px;align-items:center}.seven h1:after,.seven h1:before{content:" ";display:block;border-bottom:1px solid #c50000;border-top:1px solid #c50000;height:5px;background-color:#f8f8f8}.row{max-width:800px;margin:0 auto;background:#fff;position:relative;z-index:1;text-align:center}.row:before{position:absolute;content:"";display:block;top:0;left:-5000px;height:100%;width:100%;z-index:-1;background:inherit}.row:first-child{padding:40px 30px}.row:nth-child(2),.row:nth-child(8),.row:nth-child(10){background:none}.row:nth-child(3),.row:nth-child(7){background:#11f3b7}.row:nth-child(4),.row:nth-child(6){background:#43eb87}.row:nth-child(5){background:#b2e3af}.row span{position:relative;display:inline-block;margin:30px}.basic-slide{display:inline-block;width:300px;padding:10px 0 10px 15px;font-family:Open Sans,sans;font-weight:400;color:#040404;background:#f3efef;border:0;border-radius:3px;outline:0;text-indent:70px;transition:all .3s ease-in-out}.basic-slide::-webkit-input-placeholder{color:#f3efef;text-indent:0;font-weight:300}.basic-slide+label{display:inline-block;position:absolute;top:0;left:0;height:100%;padding:10px 15px;text-shadow:0 1px 0 #000;background:#f8b4a8;transition:all .3s ease-in-out;border-top-left-radius:3px;border-bottom-left-radius:3px}.basic-slide:active,.basic-slide:focus{color:#0d0d0c;text-indent:0;background:#ede8e8;border-top-left-radius:0;border-bottom-left-radius:0}.basic-slide:active::-webkit-input-placeholder,.basic-slide:focus::-webkit-input-placeholder{color:#aaa}.basic-slide:active+label,.basic-slide:focus+label{transform:translateX(-100%)}.list{font-size:24px;font-weight:600;color:#999;text-align:center;margin-top:30px;margin-bottom:5px;text-transform:uppercase;letter-spacing:.05em;padding-bottom:2px;font-family:Open Sans,sans-serif}.container{position:relative;top:50%;left:50%;margin-left:-120px;width:130px}.container,button{height:40px;text-align:center}button{outline:none;width:200px;border-radius:40px;background:transparent;border:3px solid tomato;color:tomato;letter-spacing:2px;text-shadow:0;font-size:12px;font-weight:700;cursor:pointer;transition:all .25s ease}button:hover{color:#fff;background:tomato}button:active{letter-spacing:2px}button:after{content:"GENERATE GRID"}.footer-basic{padding:40px 0;color:#4b4c4d;position:sticky;background:#f8efee;bottom:0;width:100%;margin-top:auto;text-align:center}.footer-basic ul{padding:0;list-style:none;text-align:center;font-size:18px;line-height:1.6;margin-bottom:0}.footer-basic li{padding:0 10px}.footer-basic ul a{color:inherit;text-decoration:none;opacity:.8}.footer-basic ul a:hover{opacity:1}.footer-basic .social{text-align:center;padding-bottom:15px}.footer-basic .social>a{font-size:24px;width:40px;height:40px;line-height:40px;display:inline-block;text-align:center;border-radius:50%;border:1px solid #ccc;margin:0 8px;color:inherit;opacity:.75}.footer-basic .social>a:hover{opacity:.9}.footer-basic .copyright{margin-top:15px;text-align:center;font-size:13px;color:#aaa;margin-bottom:0}
